channel.title: Easy command
channel.description:
Just couldn't find it anywhere..
I want my admins to be able to give my players donorPoints
So.. How to write a command that makes it possible to give other players donorPoints? I'm on Delta317.
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Easy command
item.dc:creator: @langkampo langkampo
item.description:
@langkampo wrote:

Ok, thanks i will try it! If it works i will let you know got to diner now

item.title: Easy command
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

I just whipped this up real quick. See if this works.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givedonorpoints") && c.playerRights >= 2) { try { String giveDonorPoints = playerCommand.substring(12); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(giveDonorPoints)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].donorPoints = #; c.sendMessage("You have given donator points to "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { //c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } } if (playerCommand.startsWith("takedonorpoints") && c.playerRights >= 2) { try { String giveDonor = playerCommand.substring(12); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(giveDonorPoints)) { Server.playerHandler.players[i].donorPoints = #; c.sendMessage("You have taken donator points from "+Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { //c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic
